text: Music & Me is the third studio album by American singer Michael Jackson, released on April 13, 1973. It was released under the Motown label and features a collection of pop and soul tracks that showcase Jackson's vocal talents as a young artist. This album includes songs such as "With a Child's Heart," "Up Again," and "Happy," among others. Music & Me was relatively less commercially successful than some of his other albums, but it still demonstrated Michael Jackson's evolving artistry and his ability to connect emotionally with his audience, even at a young age. The album is notable for its heartfelt lyrics and Jackson's signature vocal style.
title: Music & Me
